item.description:
the incredible funk & reggae band, entrain, is back at johnny d's.

we always have an amazing time at entrain shows, dancing non-stop.

if you haven't seen entrain before, check them out here; try out a couple of their songs in the music player and see if you want to dance.




Notes:

johnny d's has a cover charge; usually $10. note that this cover charge is not waived if you are having dinner at johnny d's.

parking can be tight in davis square, so if you're driving allow extra time to find parking. see this parking map to get an idea of the local parking options.

for T riders: the davis square red line T stop is directly across the street from johnny d's.

i'll email details on how to find me at johnny d's on friday evening at about 6 p.m.

looking forward to seeing everyone out on the dance floor!
item.how_to_find_us: i'll email a cell # to everyone who RSVPs 'Yes' or 'Maybe' by 6 november, 6 p.m.
item.name: Entrain @ Johnny D's
